content.text: Sin Eater

Condition absorber, debuff manager, crew sustain. You take what hurts your allies and decide where it goes — into you, into Toxicity, or into the enemy. Abilities focus on expanding your absorption capacity, improving transfer efficiency, and surviving the load.
T1 — Baseline (Free)

Burden Sense (Passive): You can see active conditions on any creature within Medium range as visible rift distortions — colored auras, dark threads, pulsing marks. You always know who’s suffering and what from. Additionally, your Afflict and Curse Touch effects (from augment tree) gain +1 to their Interface check when targeting an enemy you’ve already scanned with Burden Sense this encounter. Knowing what ails them helps you know what to inflict.
T2 — Pick from (300 cr each)
Steady Hands (Passive): Your Absorb actions don’t provoke opportunity attacks. Walk in, pull Bleed off the Berserker, walk out.
Empathic Shield (Active, 1 AP): An ally within Close range gets +2 to resist the next condition applied to them. Preemptive defense.
Pain Split (Passive): When you Absorb, you can split — half stacks to you, half destroyed. Round in the condition’s favor.
Calming Presence (Passive): Allies within Close range are immune to fear and panic effects. Your presence stabilizes.
Contamination Read (Active, 1 AP): Touch an enemy. Learn all active conditions, current Toxicity, and any buffs.
Transfer Efficiency (Passive): The +1 Toxicity cost per Absorb is reduced to +0 for the first Absorb each turn. One clean transfer.
T3 — Pick from (600 cr each)
Infectious Compassion (Passive): When you Absorb from an ally, they gain +1 to their next check. Your touch encourages.
Backlash (Active, 1 AP): When you Purge a condition, apply it to the nearest enemy within Close range at half strength. Offensive purging.
Overload Tolerance (Passive): Carry up to 5 conditions before overload penalties begin (normally 3 with Pain Threshold).
Sympathetic Bond (Active, 2 AP): Link to an ally for 3 rounds. Conditions applied to them auto-copy to you at half strength. Passive absorption.
Condition Immunity (Passive): Choose one condition type. You are permanently immune. Can only be taken once.
Tox Channel (Active, 1 AP): Convert 3 of your Toxicity into healing — touch an ally and heal 1d6+Interface bonus HP. Contamination becomes medicine.
Suffering Echo (Passive): When you Absorb a condition from an ally, the enemy who originally applied it takes -1 to their next attack. Your absorption resonates back through the rift connection.
Purification Pulse (Active, 2 AP): Remove all conditions from yourself. For each condition removed, one ally within Close range heals 2 HP. Your suffering converts into mending. Once per encounter.
T4 — Pick from (1,000 cr each)
Living Antidote (Passive): Allies within Close range automatically reduce Poison, Bleed, and Toxicity accumulation by 1 per turn. Passive cleanse field.
Sin Eater’s Gambit (Active, 4 AP): Absorb all conditions from all allies within Medium range. Convert all to Toxicity. Redirect all onto a single enemy. One action. Once per encounter.
Sacrifice (Passive): When an ally within Medium range would be downed, take the killing blow instead. Ally stays at 1 HP. You take the damage (bypasses armor). Once per encounter.

Vessel of Suffering (Passive): While carrying 3+ absorbed conditions, gain +2 Armor and regenerate 1 HP at the start of each turn. The more you carry, the more the rift sustains you. Your pain becomes your shield.
